Proverb: We don't know what is going on right in front of us
Doing one task can bring two benefits
Talk of the devil and he will appear

속담: 발 없는 말이 천 리를 간다

Proverb: Haste does not always equal quality
Whilst I am at it, I might as well do this too

속담: 닭 소 보듯  소 닭 보듯 한다
Proverb: Mooning over each other, but pretending not to

속담: 열 길 물속은 알아도 한 길 사람 속은 모른다
열 번 찍어 안 넘어가는 너무 없다
Proverb: Don't give up until you succeed
Too many cooks spoil the broth

속담: 가는 말이 고와야 오는 말이 곱다

Proverb: To not know A from B (to be ignorant)
The grass is greener on the other side of the fence

속담: 낮말은 새가 듣고 밤말은 쥐가 듣는다
